name: Click to Escape - Flash (Expires Dec-2020)
description:
This Game was designed in 2018 in Flash 8. (No Coding)

To play this game you need to enable flash in your browser.

once enabled it will prompt you again just click "Allow" and play the game.

You only need your mouse click to play this game. 

When designing this game I did not know how to code. :)
